nodes.text: The Cavrilhu Pirates had a base in an asteroid of the Kauron asteroid field. It was equipped with a special zero gravity chamber designed to capture and hold Jedi.

Luke Skywalker tracked the Cavrilhu Pirates back to their base in the asteroid field. Luke successfully infiltrated their base, but was caught and nearly trapped by the inventive outlaws. However, he escaped and was rescued by Mara Jade shortly before their base self-destructed.
